tool_description: Identifies related scripture passages that connect thematically, linguistically, or doctrinally to a given reference.

reference.description: Primary scripture reference to find cross-references for

reference_type.description: Type of cross-references: thematic, doctrinal, linguistic, quotation, or all

max_references.description: Maximum number of cross-references to return (1-50)

error_messages: Invalid reference: Provide a valid scripture reference in standard format.
Invalid reference type: Use one of [thematic, doctrinal, linguistic, quotation, all].
Invalid max_references: Must be an integer between 1 and 50.
No cross-references found: The specified passage has no identifiable cross-references of the requested type.
usage: Provide a scripture reference and specify the type of cross-references desired. Optionally set maximum number and enable strength scoring. Returns related passages with connection explanations.

connection_types.description: Type of connection for each cross-reference

explanations.description: Brief explanations of why each passage is cross-referenced
